name: DINOPIXEL
description:
DINOPIXEL

Play as the hungry DINOPIXEL in this city, destroy cars and create mayhem in this arcade platform

HOW TO PLAY:

Left Arrow, Right Arrow: Move the Dinopixel

Down Arrow: Crouch

Space: Jump

X: Eat

CREDITS:

Luiz Gama: Art and Programming, Voices.

Luan Moraes: Menu Music and Sound Effects, Voices.

Matheus Palheta: Main Music.

This game was made with resources from UEA LUDUS (https://www.facebook.com/uealuduslab)
